entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kangirsuk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:23 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -35.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kangirsuk Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -35.2°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -38.9°C
Wind: WNW 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature steady near minus 35.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 49 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 42 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
